subtests.name: Can set 'perspective' to CSS-wide keywords: initial
Can set 'perspective' to CSS-wide keywords: inherit
Can set 'perspective' to CSS-wide keywords: unset
Can set 'perspective' to CSS-wide keywords: revert
Can set 'perspective' to var() references:  var(--A)
Can set 'perspective' to the 'none' keyword: none
Can set 'perspective' to a length: calc(0px + 0em)
Setting 'perspective' to a percent throws TypeError
Setting 'perspective' to a time throws TypeError
Setting 'perspective' to an angle throws TypeError
Setting 'perspective' to a flexible length throws TypeError
Setting 'perspective' to a number throws TypeError
Setting 'perspective' to a URL throws TypeError
Setting 'perspective' to a transform throws TypeError
